description: The trees of the ridge rise up to great heights, obscuring all vision of the hills below.  Small bushes of wild thanot are strategically placed around private gates to complete the illusion of a mountain glade.

The trees of the ridge rise up to great heights, obscuring all vision of the hills below.  Small bushes of wild thanot are strategically placed around private gates to complete the illusion of a mountain glade.  Small lanterns illuminate the surroundings, casting leaping shadows.
title: [Boreas Ridge, Zephyr Lane]
